name: EBAN ASBL - The European Trade Association for Business Angels, Seed Funds and Early Stage Market Players
goal: EBAN is the pan-European representative for the early stage investor community, gathering 197 member organisations in 59 countries around the world. Established in 1999 by a group of pioneer angel networks in Europe with the collaboration of the European Commission and EURADA, EBAN represents a sector estimated to invest 9,9 billion Euros a year and playing a vital role in Europeâ€™s future, notably in the funding of SMEs.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Capital Markets Union
Digital Single Market
Connecting SMEs to private investors
Harmonising regulations
